scripts.start: watchman watch-del-all; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache; rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-*;expo start --clear
scripts.pods: cd ios; bundle exec pod install;cd ..
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/; yarn cache clean; yarn install; watchman watch-del-all; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache; rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-*
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/build; pod cache clean --all; rm -rf ios/Pods; cd ios; xcodebuild -alltargets clean; cd ..; yarn run pods
scripts.clean:platforms: yarn run clean; yarn run clean:android; yarn run clean:ios
scripts.clean:deep: rm -rf ~/.cocoapods; rm -rf /Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData; rm -rf ~/.gradle/; rm -rf $(getconf DARWIN_USER_CACHE_DIR)/org.llvm.clang/ModuleCache; rm -rf $(getconf DARWIN_USER_CACHE_DIR)/org.llvm.clang.$(whoami)/ModuleCache; rm -fr ~/Library/Caches/com.apple.dt.Xcode/; yarn run clean:platforms
scripts.deploy:android:development:release: cd android && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env development.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:android:production:release: cd android && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env production.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:ios:development:release: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env development.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:ios:production:release: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env production.release; cd ..
